name: Cranker (Playdate)
description:
An idle-ish clicker cranker game for the playdate. It's a demo that probably won't get any updates, but it's an easy-play for a couple of minutes every now and then.

If you want to leave it running to rack up those cranks then there is an option in the pause menu to turn off auto-sleep.

Although I have no plans to update. If you come across any game-breaking bugs then leave a comment and I'll try to give them a fix.
Note that there is no end game screen - eventually the numbers will get too big and overflow to negative...
